story.title: Our story
story.subtitle: How did we get here?
story.text:
Everything started in Germany. Zeynep had moved there from Turkey to work in a town near Berlin, but after a while she settled in Nuremberg, and as luck would have it, she ended up sharing an apartment with Víctor, one of Fran's best friends.

One weekend, the two of us coincided at Víctor's birthday party. That's when we started talking, drinking together, and singing songs from our favorite bands on the karaoke machine. Neither of us knew that night was just the beginning.

Since then, we continued talking via WhatsApp, videocalling, and watching movies and series together online. Also, taking advantage of the fact that he was able to work remotely, Fran traveled to Germany very often, which helped to settle our relationship.

After some time, we made the decision to take the next step in our relationship, choosing Spain as our next home, and waiting to see what kind of adventures time and circumstances would bring us after our marriage.

What started as a simple night singing karaoke together has taken us all the way to our wedding day, which we can't wait to share with you all.

timeline.title: Program
timeline.subtitle: Don't miss what we have prepared!

stop1.title: Guest pick-up - Stop 1
stop1.description: A bus will be available for the guests to go to the Hacienda. The bus will start its route around 11:00 and will make a first stop of 15 minutes at the Plaza Cristo de Gracia.

stop2.title: Guest pick-up - Stop 2
stop2.description:
The bus will make a second and last stop of 15 minutes around 11:45 at the esplanade of the Hotel Córdoba Center. At 12:00 the bus will depart for the Hacienda.

FYI: If you haven't arrived on time at this stop, we recommend ordering a cab by phone or by app.

ceremony.title: Civil ceremony
ceremony.description: We will begin in the beautiful gardens of the Hacienda celebrating the civil ceremony. Ezgi and Víctor, friends of the bride and groom, will officiate the ceremony and provide a personal and emotional touch.

cocktail.title: Welcome cocktail
cocktail.description: After the ceremony, we will enjoy a welcome cocktail in the same gardens, with which we will taste different small bites of traditional recipes from Córdoba.

lunch.title: Lunch
lunch.description: We will continue entering the main hall of the Hacienda and, once seated, we will have lunch while we contemplate the beautiful and privileged views of the city.

party.title: Party
party.description: And... it's time to burn everything we've eaten, giving it all on the dance floor! We will enjoy a minimum of four hours of music and open bar at the Hacienda's discotheque, without missing the traditional "redinner" to recharge your batteries.
